English
In Mid-17th century France: young Louis XIV is struggling for his throne, beggars
and thieves haunt Paris and brigands roam the countryside. Fifth child of an
impoverished country nobleman, AngÃƒÂ©lique de SancÃƒÂ© de Monteloup grows up in the
